alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:00PM MST until February 21 at 4:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * Dust Storm Warning Extended. * At 156 PM MST, satellite continues to detect significant dust channels streaming off Red Lake north of Kingman due to wind gusts around 50 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Anteras Road and Pierce Ferry Road will be significantly impacted by blowing dust and near zero visibilities. Locations impacted include... Diamond Creek Campground. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
